text:
I'm going to talk about a paint, based on the novel of Alex Dupont : the tell tale heart. Alex Dupont is the painter, she realized 3 artworks inspired of his novels. When I was in high school, I read the tell tale heart during my classes of LLCER. It's a very difficult book in english for two reasons. Firstly, this novel was published in 15th century so the vocabulary is kind of difficult. Secondly, the darkness of the history can be difficult for someone.
First of all, the paint show two men. They seem fighting. one of them is trying to put off the eye of the other one. There is a lot of violence wich is showed in this artwork. En efect, we can see angry in the look of the agressor. The other man seems totally passive. he is not trying to defend himself even if he is attacked. Painted colors are in general dark. there is a lot of work with shadows, so it gave, to the viewer, feelings of darkness and madness.
I think, this artwork is very impressive. the artist have tryed to gave us an horror atmosphere and for me she haven't failed. In addition, this piece of art is a lot similary to the novel. This could be a good book first page to transmit to the reader a view of what he is going to read.
Alex Dupont is a very good artist and i think that she deserves much famosity.
